title: Project One
description: This is a brief description of Project One. It showcases the use of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to create a responsive web application.

title: Project Two
description: This project demonstrates the implementation of a RESTful API using Node.js and Express, along with a front-end built in React.

title: Project Three
description: An interactive web application that utilizes WebSockets for real-time communication, built with Vanilla JavaScript.

title: E-commerce Website
description: A fully responsive e-commerce platform with product search, cart functionality, and secure checkout process.

title: Weather Dashboard
description: Real-time weather application showing current conditions and 5-day forecasts using weather API data.
